item.text: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the command of God our Savior and of Christ Jesus our hope,
to Timothy, my genuine child in the faith. Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord!
As I urged you when I was leaving for Macedonia, stay on in Ephesus to instruct certain people not to spread false teachings,

<st data-num="3366" class="">nor</st> to <st data-num="4337" class="">occupy</st> themselves with <st data-num="3454" class="">myths</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="562" class="">interminable</st> <st data-num="1076" class="">genealogies</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">Such things</st> <st data-num="3930">promote</st> <st data-num="1567">useless speculations</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="3622" class="">redemptive plan</st><n id="2" /> that operates <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">aim</st> of our <st data-num="3852" class="">instruction</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> that comes <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="2513" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, a <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="505" class="">sincere</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5100" class="">Some</st> have <st data-num="795" class="">strayed</st> from these and <st data-num="1624">turned away</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3150">empty discussion</st>.
They want to be teachers of the law, but they do not understand what they are saying or the things they insist on so confidently.
But we know that the law is good if someone uses it legitimately,

<st data-num="1492" class="">realizing</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">intended</st> for a <st data-num="1342">righteous person</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> for <st data-num="459" class="">lawless</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="506" class="">rebellious people</st>, for the <st data-num="765" class="">ungodly</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>, for the <st data-num="462" class="">unholy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="952" class="">profane</st>, for those who <st data-num="3964 3389">kill</st> their <st data-num="3964">fathers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3389" class="">mothers</st>, for <st data-num="409" class="">murderers</st>,

<st data-num="4205">sexually immoral people</st>, <st data-num="733">practicing homosexuals</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="405" class="">kidnappers</st>, <st data-num="5583" class="">liars</st>, <st data-num="1965" class="">perjurers</st>—<st data-num="2532">in fact</st>, for <st data-num="5100" class="">any</st> who live <st data-num="480" class="">contrary</st> to <st data-num="5198" class="">sound</st> <st data-num="1319" class="">teaching</st>.
This accords with the glorious gospel of the blessed God that was entrusted to me.
I am grateful to the one who has strengthened me, Christ Jesus our Lord, because he considered me faithful in putting me into ministry,

even though I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4387" class="">formerly</st> a <st data-num="989" class="">blasphemer</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="1376" class="">persecutor</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> an <st data-num="5197" class="">arrogant</st><n id="1" /> man. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> I was <st data-num="1653" class="">treated with mercy</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">acted</st> <st data-num="50" class="">ignorantly</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="570" class="">unbelief</st>,

<st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> was <st data-num="5250" class="">abundant</st>, <st data-num="3326" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="1" />

This <st data-num="3056" class="">saying</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="4103" class="">trustworthy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="514" class="">deserves</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">full</st> <st data-num="594" class="">acceptance:</st> “<st data-num="5547">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2064">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>”—and <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">worst</st> of <st data-num="3739">them</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1223 3778">here is why</st> I was <st data-num="1653">treated with mercy</st>: <st data-num="2443">so that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> as the <st data-num="4413" class="">worst</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> could <st data-num="1731" class="">demonstrate</st> his <st data-num="537" class="">utmost</st> <st data-num="3115" class="">patience</st>, <st data-num="4314" class="">as</st> an <st data-num="5296" class="">example</st> for those who are <st data-num="3195">going to</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.
Now to the eternal King, immortal, invisible, the only God, be honor and glory forever and ever! Amen.
I put this charge before you, Timothy my child, in keeping with the prophecies once spoken about you, in order that with such encouragement you may fight the good fight.

To do this<n id="1" /> you must <st data-num="2192">hold firmly</st> to <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> have <st data-num="683" class="">rejected</st> and so have <st data-num="3489">suffered shipwreck</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">in regard to</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.
Among these are Hymenaeus and Alexander, whom I handed over to Satan to be taught not to blaspheme.
